about_the_game:
Free 10 levels DEMO


The Digi-Dodgy® Demo showcases within 10 levels the core mechanics and concept of the still-in-development collectathon platformer video game. (Assets in the demo are only prototypes).

Story


A digital virus has corrupted the DigiWorld. The Bots that reside within are now under the control of the evil MegaBot.

The world’s fate lies on the small shoulders of a defective bot untouched by the virus named Digi.

He must collect all the DigiOrbs that DigiWorld’s antivirus defence system has released. Digi may be too small to face the corrupted bots head-on but he can dodge his way to saving the DigiWorld.

Digi get Dodging!!!

Character concept artwork


Throughout the demo, you see character concept artworks indicating how the characters will look in the finalised video game.

name: Digi-Dodgy® Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Free 10 levels DEMO for the still-in-development collectathon platformer videogame Digi-Dodgy®. (Assets in the demo are only prototypes to help showcase the core mechanics of the videogame).
